About Us Vision / Mission

ILKE CNC OTOMAT

Our company has found in 2011 and operates with a 600 m2 workshop and 200 m2 office space, in Nilufer Akva Industrial District at Bursa Turkey. With our management team of 20-plus years experience and 14 personel, we are providing CNC lathe machining, nut, bolt, pin, bushing manufacturing and tube cutting services to the industries such as automotive, machine, civil engineering, food and furniture, in a 24 hour shift system.

Since 2011, we provide our costumers fast, feasible and reliable production with our green production which has a ISO 9001:2015 certificate.


CEO
Rahmi Duran ERSUZ

We are producing fast, feasible and reliable solutions to the automotive, machine, civil engineering, food and furniture industries with a management team of 20-plus years experience, 14 personel and ISO 9001:2015 quality certificate.
